credentialSubject.name: Sally Sanders
credentialSubject.evidenceDescription: I led a team from our company to help build homes with Habitat for Humanity twice a month for 6 months.  Our team was recognized as one of the most reliable on the site, and we contributed to the construction of two homes.  I was responsible for coordinating the volunteers and the work.

criteria.narrative: Leading a team of volunteers, inspiring and recruiting people to join, and watching out that everyone was included and involved.

achievement.description: I led a team from our company to help build homes with Habitat for Humanity twice a month for 6 months.  Our team was recognized as one of the most reliable on the site, and we contributed to the construction of two homes.  I was responsible for coordinating the volunteers and the work.
achievement.name: Leadership
